definition: Dai county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Firstly, this paper reviews Chinese previous county and township administrative system systematically.
